text: Platyptilia fulva is a moth of the family Pterophoridae. It is known from La Réunion, Madagascar and Mauritius. The larvae feed on Cosmos species and Emilia citrina. ==References== fulva Category:Moths of Madagascar Category:Insects of Mauritius Category:Insects of Réunion Category:Moths of Africa Category:Moths described in 1964
title: Platyptilia fulva
